entry.title: Ticketing x Chatbot
entry.summary:
Description

Mayday's Concert Ticket is extremly hot in Asia. Cooperated with HKMayday, one of the largest Hong Kong Mayday Fans Club, Life.UnLtd HK, a telegram chatbot, is built for handling the complicated problem in exchanging / selling ticket within the fans.

This topic will share with you about:

  • How to build the telegram chatbot via Python
  • What I faced during develop this chatbot
